thread.title: A taste of Indian delights awaits
thread.title_full: A taste of Indian delights awaits

title: A taste of Indian delights awaits
text:
A taste of Indian delights awaits 7th Jul 2015 5:00 PM Local Real Estate Cars For Sale 
CRUISECO is providing guests with the chance to experience its incredible Authentic Asia India itinerary onboard RV Ganges Voyager, with a 10-night cruise-only offer. 
Departing November12, guests will travel through the heart of India, from Kolkata to Patna, experiencing the enchanting blend of culture, sights and cuisines along the way. 
International marketing manager Amber Wilson said: "Cruiseco has experienced overwhelming success from our original 27-night land and cruise adventure through India. 
"It's a destination that travellers should visit at least once in their lifetime, so we've developed this cruise-only offer to ensure that those who aren't able to get away for the full 27-night itinerary can still experience this incredible part of the world. 
"Travelling on the RV Ganges Voyager is the perfect way to see India - with elegant common areas, opulent accommodation, and unparalleled service, as well as a delectable mix of Western and Indian culinary delights, this truly is travelling in style." 
Prices for this cruise-only offer start from $4990 per person, based on twin share for a signature stateroom. 
Prices include: a 10-night luxury cruise aboard RV Ganges Voyager; all meals while aboard; local beer, soft drinks, coffee, tea and mineral water while cruising; house red and white wine with lunch and dinner; onboard gratuities; and transfer from Patna to Varanasi Airport. 
To book phone (02)99294500, ext 4, or email charters@cruiseco.com.au . 
Cruiseco also has the full 27-night experience departing on November6, with prices starting from $17,199 per person, twin share. cruising
